titleInfo.title: Music Masters series with Bob Neuwirth (signed)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (purple and red on white) Hatch poster announcing the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum sponsored performance of Music Master Bob Neuwirth presented in support of Dylan, Cash and the Nashville Cats exhibit. Poster features woodcut of a guitar. Poster is signed by artist.
